website_summaries.verdict: A fantastic choice if you are looking for a high-quality anti-theft backpack without paying the Best of the Best prices.
pros: The cut-proof fabric is also shockproof and waterproof
Anti-theft protection includes a hidden zipper and secret pockets
Features a USB charging port inside the pack
Comfortable and lightweight – perfect for city walking and traveling
cons: Some customers had issues with the bag's inside pockets ripping, as well as the bag losing shape

customer_reviews.title: the material is not good.. it is not what I expected for ...
customer_reviews.text: the material is not good .. it is not what I expected for the price. It's not original I want my money back
customer_reviews.author: Urbano

customer_reviews.title: Anti-theft or Real-joke
customer_reviews.text: The coded backpack strap lock is disfunctuonal and it’s impossible to change the code to anything other than the factory 000. Good thing it’s so broken it’s impossible to lock myself out (shout out directions). For a $100 backpack marketed as being anti theft but product is really “easy theft” in reality is a joke. My personal lock won’t fit between the zippers so yay I’ve gotta return or spend more on a larger lock to do the job I expected my $100 backpack to be better than. XDesign, be better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product construction was disappointing. Will return due to lack ...
customer_reviews.text: Product construction was disappointing. Will return due to lack of complete stitching of top corners on both right and left top sections of the back pack. The item displayed had complete stitching on all corners.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awkward zippers...
customer_reviews.text: This backpack wasn't for me. Though it may look like it fits a lot, it doesn't really. If you pack it in, it gets in the way of reaching for stuff or taking your laptop out. It's also awkward to open it from the back, though this is a big part of the anti-theft component. The worse part for me was that it was so awkward to open the zippers which make this a very unpractical backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Mario Longhi

customer_reviews.title: Ergonomically sleek
customer_reviews.text: Lots of WANT TO BE theft proof backpacks out there, and this one while on the expensive side compared to the others, addresses all the issues that you would like to have and that those other bags cut corners at providing you in either aesthetics or product quality. Lots of room to house my daily accessories (Laptop, Ipad, Headset, Charger, etc....) and pockets everywhere to put ID's or other items. Very satisfied, and would highly recommend to anyone looking for a bag that they commute with daily and want their items protected.
customer_reviews.author: Rudolf Roux-Bruno

customer_reviews.title: I live in a city where robberies and pick pocketing is quite the norm and glad I have this bag to give me a bit ...
customer_reviews.text: This Anti Theft Bag definitely removes the fear of getting pick pocketed. I live in a city where robberies and pick pocketing is quite the norm and glad I have this bag to give me a bit of piece of mind. However, the reason I removed a star is because it lack the space. When you put a small 13 inch laptop and maybe a text book, the bag will look bulky. Great for those who don't have too much to carry but for those who carry a ton, then this bag may not be for you.
customer_reviews.author: Ross

customer_reviews.title: Great Overall Bag!
customer_reviews.text: I used this bag to travel to Italy And Egypt and it was the best! Lightweight and it actually fit alot of stuff. One downer is i wished it would have a pocket to hold a water bottle but i know the objective is to prevent theft but a water bottle pocket on the side would make this the best overall bag. I had this on for a whole trip of walking around Rome and the bag was comfortable and didnt hurt my back unlike other bags.
customer_reviews.author: MaximilianoJRP

customer_reviews.title: It’s a FAKE!
customer_reviews.text: This bag is a FAKE! Not one tag sewn in, all zippers are different, does not say XD design ANYWHERE on the bag. I’m so disappointed because it was a birthday present and it came 4 weeks late. STAY FAR AWAY!
customer_reviews.author: T. Davila

customer_reviews.title: I mostly love it
customer_reviews.text: I love it, I have been using it for years. It's perfect if you use public transportation all the time. Even though it's a bit big for me, it doesn't hurt my back unless I use it too high. I did find some problems with it, like after some months the usb cable ended up being pushed inside when I tried to use it. I was able to get it from inside and glue it again so it wasn't a problem. I also can't get it as high as I want on my back, the weight on it just keeps on making it fall.
customer_reviews.author: Jesica

customer_reviews.title: The lightweight beast!
customer_reviews.text: Got this bag since I'll be traveling quite a bit from now on and need a way to take my electronics with me. Its everything the description says, lightweight, tough, and I've already seen how water resistant it is! It sits very comfortably on my back which was a concern of mine. Only mild complaint I have is that its sometimes a pain to unzip cause of the anti theft flap that sits on the zipper, but frankly I like the peace of mind that my stuff is more secure more than anything so its a forgettable issue. All in all I love this bag and highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Young

customer_reviews.title: Small but great quality
customer_reviews.text: Beautifully designed and well made backpack. I love that it’s lightweight. It really doesn’t hold much though. I used it to travel overseas for 10 days and could barely fit 3 outfits and toiletries, then I just did laundry in the sink every couple of days to get by. But at least I felt safe and didn’t overpack!
customer_reviews.author: chaoticcadaver

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product!! I waited a few months to give this a review and really check out what this bag is really about. Definitely a go to back for tech. I am able to charge my phone while traveling around, just by connecting a usb towards the bottom right part of my bag, doesn’t give any power issues whatsoever. Everything is well compacted. I carry a laptop, notebook, headphones and many more things inside. What leads me a little to the downside is that I attempt to put my 32oz flask inside which gives it a hard time to close, so I have to keep it with me. Other than that amazing product.
customer_reviews.author: Hernan

customer_reviews.title: Cool bag, but not enough space.
customer_reviews.text: Great feeling quality, feels small on my back though. Doesn’t have much room for stuff inside. Doesn’t have specific pouch for portable charger like the Mark Ryden version of this bag. Not really worth the money if you ask me
customer_reviews.author: Konnor Bolton

customer_reviews.title: Theft-proof, sleek and nice-looking!
customer_reviews.text: I've gotten a lot of questions about, and compliments on my backpack! I love it as much as I thought I would for both travel and college. I see what other people pay $60-$70 bucks for and they're garbage compared to this one! I also loved that you had a few nice colors to choose from. Was tired of basic black! Very sharp looking and totally comfortable on my back, even when stuffed with my college books!
customer_reviews.author: Happy Customer

customer_reviews.title: Overall great, but hard to open.
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I love it. My issue is that it doesn't sit open when you need to pull stuff in and out quickly. It really takes two hands to maneuver. Also, the lower part of the interior collapses quite a bit, so anything like a notebook you are trying to put into the large (non-laptop) pocket gets hung up on items in the smaller lower pockets.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Lavail

customer_reviews.title: Will probably not sustain more than one trip
customer_reviews.text: Design is good, but backpack is heavy on its own. It is expected with all extra layers and anti-knife protection, just keep that in mind if your airline carrier is weighing your carry on luggage. Both handles started giving up and rip after one 2-week trip.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great city backpack, not too spacey though
customer_reviews.text: I got what I ordered. Pros - Good materials and design - Not nervous anymore that someone could get to my things wile i'm wearing them on my back - Very comfortable to wear Cons - Not too spacey - I would prefer more internal pockets to be able to organize smaller EDC items better. This is intended for smaller items i guess, since bigger ones wouldn't fit anyways. I managed to "fix" this by using smaller organizers
customer_reviews.author: Konstantin Babiy

customer_reviews.title: Cool backpack
customer_reviews.text: Super cool backpack. I feel comfortable with my brother walking around during his travels with it and not have things stolen.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: eleminate the possibility of someone opening up you pack from behind
customer_reviews.text: Good design. Zipper is tucked away and very aerodynamic for riding your bike.
customer_reviews.author: PWR

customer_reviews.title: Peace of mind when traveling
customer_reviews.text: Great travel backpack that gives a peace of mind. The volume is a bit small, and things will have to squeeze into the larger compartment. The zipper feels flimsy, so I use extra care when operating the zipper in hoping it does not break soon. I only use it for travel and do not think it will hold for long if I use daily.
customer_reviews.author: J.L.

customer_reviews.title: Nothing against the seller. Yeah I bought two.
customer_reviews.text: I had such a hype for this backpack because it seemed very functional, And it is. however, it’s kind of hard to open due to the square shape of the edges. You will be happy with this bag but somehow stuffing it or getting stuff out of it will disappoint you a bit.
customer_reviews.author: David M.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: nice bag, smaller then I thought it would be but it works
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love it! It sits great on my back & it takes away lots of the weight from the books and laptop I take with me. Love the pockets but one and the charger works great.
customer_reviews.author: TS Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack for college
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t used this backpack for travel purposes but, I can’t imagine it won’t be great. I use this as my school backpack and it’s awesome. I especially love the red color. I can’t add much on all of the features as I haven’t used them. Although, it will sure be nice to have when I need them.
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: Nice deal
customer_reviews.text: High quality, nice colours and practical for students to use
customer_reviews.author: BOB Rad

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: It's more than I expected, really good quality and beatifull product.
customer_reviews.author: Pablo

customer_reviews.title: If you are looking for the original XDDesign bag this ...
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for the original XDDesign bag this is not it. The original bag comes with a serial number that you can register in the original webpage. These bags are made in China. I returned mine right away and got a refound.
customer_reviews.author: Hector Andrade

customer_reviews.title: GREAT Backpack!
customer_reviews.text: Great Backpack! Excellent inside distribution inside. Great size, great weight, great features, Great Everything!
customer_reviews.author: R. Gomez

customer_reviews.title: good for the back
customer_reviews.text: quick delivery, well constructed, a little smaller than I hoped for.
customer_reviews.author: Mary L. Malik

customer_reviews.title: My son went on a school Spring Break trip to ...
customer_reviews.text: My son went on a school Spring Break trip to Italy, which was during Holy Week nonetheless. Pickpocketers were at the height of activity and aggression, but guess what? His whole group went unscathed, because he singlehandedly defended everyone's things with this backpack! No thefts!
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Must buy
customer_reviews.text: This is a must buy. Perfect gift for the tech savvy relative.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: It broke after less than 3 months of wearing it. Not worth your money.
customer_reviews.author: Nicoletta

customer_reviews.title: Bag. Secured.
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Best bag I’ve ever owned. I also got to rain cover and keep it on my bag.

customer_reviews.title: Tiny
customer_reviews.text: Might as well be the Xtra Small can’t fit anything wouldn’t recommend for Vacation, school, or work

customer_reviews.title: It was a scam
customer_reviews.text: When it arrived it was flat and it’s suppose to be a hard shell kind of bag. It wasn’t made by XD Design but more of a knock off. It didn’t even have the cable for the usb plug on the outside. It was just a hole. Would not recommend this product from amazon. If you really want it but it from the website

customer_reviews.title: but the color is easily washed off
customer_reviews.text: It does it’s job well, but the color is easily washed off. Need to be gentle when cleaning.

customer_reviews.title: Good for travel, No more worries for thief in the crowd
customer_reviews.text: I really like this back pack. Exactly the same in the picture.

customer_reviews.title: He loved it! He uses it to office everyday from ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a birthday gift for my husband. He loved it! He uses it to office everyday from the time we received it.

customer_reviews.title: I really like the look of the backpack
customer_reviews.text: I really like the look of the backpack. It matches my school colors and it just looks clean. It’s is I little bit overpriced but it’s not a disappointment. The one thing I wish it had the most is just a little more room in the actually back pack. But it works great and is very comfortable.

customer_reviews.title: Great for a semester-at-sea program!
customer_reviews.text: It fits everything I need for a five day excursion while in a port. Along with keeping all my belongings secure enough for me not to worry that something will secretly get snatched from me while abroad in a port.

customer_reviews.title: He said it’s perfect and beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I gave it as gift for my friend.. it was his dream. He said it’s perfect and beautiful :) ,, thank you

customer_reviews.title: it is in its 3rd month and still looks great.

customer_reviews.title: A++ backpack!

customer_reviews.text: Terrible!!! Don't buy it! It should arrive 8/10 but I got it on 8/17, and the quality just awful. On the back even don't have a zipper to open the pocket! Now I need to return this item by myself waste of the time!

customer_reviews.title: I truly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is holding up outstandingly. It’s nice and compact being able to manage everything i need to put in it without any hassle.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The product has very good finish and is exactly as mentioned in the description

customer_reviews.title: Best travel/Day pack I have ever owned
customer_reviews.text: I wasn’t sure of this bag when I first received it. I have use the bag on several trips now and I’m happier than ever. The ability to open it at a tilt that says everything inside is fantastic. To be able to walk through airports in public places without the fear of someone cutting the scraps of running with your bag is nice also. Once you get used organizing you will know where everything is and it all has a place
customer_reviews.author: Johnny apple seed

customer_reviews.title: The backpack is quite comfortable and provides great back support
customer_reviews.text: The backpack is quite comfortable and provides great back support. The compartments inside are well-organized to fit all your tech and personal items.

customer_reviews.title: 2 out of 5
customer_reviews.text: Its not.the easiest to open and close . Not. Back Support get warm and makes your back sweaty.

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: It was well designed for security but too small. It could not hold what my high school student needed for daily use.
customer_reviews.author: R. Yang

customer_reviews.title: Bobby is great product. There is one feature which can be ...
customer_reviews.text: Bobby is great product. There is one feature which can be improved. It's not so obvious how to protect 12 inch laptop. Maybe additional strips or holder should be added...
customer_reviews.author: Arek

customer_reviews.title: bought it for my trip to london came in handy ...
customer_reviews.text: bought it for my trip to london came in handy many times especially when I took public transport it gave me access to my oyster card quick
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as Described
customer_reviews.text: Product is exactly as described. Some people may be getting knock offs of this product and posting their review here. But the one I got was exactly as described as if it were coming from the original retailer. Incredible build and design. Feels very well made and looks perfect as a day pack. I was hesitant on how the backpack opened thinking it may be hard to open based on the design. But the zippers are smooth and there are buttons that hold the backpack from opening all 180 degrees. I would recommend this for anyone looking for a fashionable/low key day backpack that doesn’t carry their entire house with them, but just essentials.
customer_reviews.author: Steph T

customer_reviews.title: I was super disappointed because I was so excited about buying this ...
customer_reviews.text: Within a week the charging cable stopped charging my phone. I charged the pack pack all night and right when I connected my phone it didn’t charge at all. I was super disappointed because I was so excited about buying this item.
customer_reviews.author: Diego Aviles

customer_reviews.title: Check the size before you order it
customer_reviews.text: It's a great backpack light weight durable and you can organize your things very easily

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bag but.....

customer_reviews.title: looks just the way I expected too backpack is great inside and
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time ....looks just the way I expected too backpack is great inside and out

customer_reviews.text: I bought this back pack for my sister going on a trip. She really likes it and it's a really good size, not too big not too small. She has a passport and other important things she wanted to make sure will not get lost or stolen and this back pack is perfect for it. Very sleek looking too all around worth the money and great quality

customer_reviews.title: Best Backpack on the market!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best backpack you will ever buy. I went on a 2 week trip to Europe and felt 100% confident that nobody had a chance of getting into my bag. There were 20 students on the trip, 3 of which bought competing bags and each of them got opened or slashed, but not mine!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew B.

customer_reviews.title: It's really great As good as advertised Worth every
customer_reviews.text: It's really great As good as advertised Worth every penny
customer_reviews.author: Mohamed Liyagath

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Ripped in a month, and the USB connect stopped working. Had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Mukhamed

customer_reviews.title: Best bag for your buck!
customer_reviews.text: At under $100, you get the value of the big name bands (Incase and others) at the price of an off-brand startup. The Bobby has ample storage room and plenty of pockets for tech geeks who can't leave home without every dongle, charger and device that you would conceivably need (and those you don't but wouldn't dream of being without) out in the wild. I've seen plenty of imitators on Amazon offering similarly branded/designed products for less, but the quality of this bag is guaranteed at the price point they're offering.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Shensky

customer_reviews.title: Best of the Best!
customer_reviews.text: Best backpack purchase ever. I'll never own any other kind.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: This back pack is pretty nice. I've used it a few times already and I don't regret buying it. The main zipper is hard to operate unless you pull the flap back FYI. One of the reasons why it's anti theft proof. Overall satisfied with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: alexander lee

customer_reviews.title: Great backapck, not that much room
customer_reviews.text: The backpack is great, its very high quality, it really meets my expectation. But people keep note that you could only hold so many items, I would not go out and buying this just to stuff a bunch of items like your normal backpack. Id say this is good for carrying like the bare essentials or something less amount of items to put them in.
customer_reviews.author: Hunter D.

customer_reviews.title: Sweet-looking, lightweight, functional!
customer_reviews.text: It's fantastic - very classy, lightweight and comfortable. Only downside is that it doesn't have room for much more than a laptop.
customer_reviews.author: R. J. Olstein

customer_reviews.title: solid backpack.
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this as my primary backpack ever since I've received it. This is a pretty solid backpack, waterproof, powerbank cable at the bottom is extremely useful in so many situations. The only flaw would probably be the size of the backpack, you cant put too much items in it. but otherwise 10/10. oh yea the front part of the bag might scratch easily.

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Nice simple design but not very practical. This backpack works excellent for someone who is just looking to get from point A to point B with a laptop and a few more items.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for college
customer_reviews.text: Perfect backpack i brouhgt it for college and fits like 3 notebooks my laptop, wacom drawing pad, charger and gaming mouse + my external charger and a lot of little cables (earbuds, micro usb cable etcetc) love the card slot on the shoulder perfect for putting my card on the entrance it feels really solid so i really feel it will last for a really good time
customer_reviews.author: lynus

customer_reviews.title: Love all the convenient little features of this backpack
customer_reviews.text: Love all the convenient little features of this backpack, it also looks incredible and feels much lighter then my old bag with all the same stuff in it. My Lenovo 15 inch Ideapad y700 BARELY fits, kind of a struggle putting it back in and zipping up BUT the quality and convenient features make it worth it. This will be the perfect bag whenever I buy a thinner laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Marcel Patillo

customer_reviews.title: Greatest Backpack Of All Time
customer_reviews.text: All I'm saying is when I'm walking down the street I've got the coolest, cleanest and most efficient backpack for miles! I look so good with this sleek black ninja backpack on, and everybody keeps saying "WOW, that's different. What kind of backpack is that!?" It fits everything I carry with me on a daily basis perfectly because of it's unique design. My workout bottle, lunch box, laptop, book, extra headset cords, my money, cards, papers, everything, it all fits! I'm super impressed. Very happy I bought this backpack - I'm already buying another one for my girlfriend!
customer_reviews.author: Manly

customer_reviews.author: Phyllis

customer_reviews.title: Wait for 2nd or 3rd version
customer_reviews.text: Zipper is very difficult to maneuver. Holes for lock very small. Assa abloy has a small padlock that I hoped would fit for better security but shank was too large. Pockets inside straps could use rubberized material to keep cards in place. Cable to charge not Apple certified? Would not charge phone.Would be helpful if item was available in small, medium or large. Only enough room to hold computer one text book and larger size would have been preferred. This was a gift for a tall, larger man. Only got feed back from recipient today with this feedback and that he couldn't use it. Very dissappointing for price range and past date to return.
customer_reviews.author: Nico

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: This backpack is easy to use. I like it but space is not enough for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I Feel European...
customer_reviews.text: So awesome. Best feeling bag for the back. I forget I'm even wearing it. The only downside, people dimension is in the other reviews, is when I have my MacBook in the back the capacity of the bag seems limited... So if you want to carry around a lot of stuff this is NOT the backpack, but if you're commuting and want security for all of your electronic goods, this is absolutely perfect! Another added bonus are all the secret pockets, very cool! last but not least, the main zipper has the tiny loop for a TSA Approved lock. Great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ups and downs
customer_reviews.text: It's an amazing back backpack, but it does have lots of negatives to buying it. 1) it attracts lots of dust and gets dirty easily 2) the charger port cannot be charged it has to be charging in order to use the charger port Other than that it's an amazing and organized backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor customer service
customer_reviews.text: Like the back pack a lot. A uncle broke after only 2 days of use and the company would not do anything to fix it or take it back. VERY DISAPPOINTING!
customer_reviews.author: Frances Callan

customer_reviews.title: but the interior design makes larger things like dictionary or lunch box bit difficult to fit in
customer_reviews.text: it allow me feel bit more SAFE while walking around downtown area, but the interior design makes larger things like dictionary or lunch box bit difficult to fit in.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great functional bag
customer_reviews.text: It's not that big, but it's ok. A gamer 17" wouldn't fit, but it's ok. Everything else, it's perfect
customer_reviews.author: Santiago Agustin Palmero

product_meta.title: XD Design Bobby Original Anti-Theft Laptop Backpack with USB Port (Unisex Bag)
feature_bullets: Protective layers and a Cut-Proof Protection board
Includes compartments which hold a laptop up to 15.6" and a tablet up to 10" with a total content of 13L
